description: A Java class representing a User Data Transfer Object (DTO) with attributes such as id, firstName, lastName, email, identificationNumber, and a list of associated BankAccount objects.

classes.name: User
classes.description: A data transfer object (DTO) class for User information, used for transferring user data within the application layers.
